I'm running the latest code from CVS in my host. Whenever I press the Run or Debug button, I get the following exception:

!ENTRY org.eclipse.debug.ui 4 120 Nov 01, 2002 13:27:06.820
!MESSAGE Error logged from Debug UI:

I released a fix to this earlier today - are you using the "latest" latest?
